long_description: The compact Maglite Mag-Tac(TM) flashlight can be easily carried along in a pants pocket or clipped to your belt so you always have a bright light at the ready. This little light outputs 310 lumens and throws a beam up to 182m on high. Use the tailcap switch to turn the light on and off; press the switch part way down for momentary on and off. 2 CR123 lithium batteries (included) provide up to 4 hrs. of use on high and 17 hrs. on low. Stash the flashlight on your belt or in a pants pocket with the removable clip. Maglite Mag-Tac(TM) flashlight includes a lanyard hole that is sized for 550 parachute cord (sold separately).
short_description: The compact Maglite Mag-Tac(TM) flashlight can be easily carried along in a pants pocket or clipped to your belt so you always have a bright light at the ready.
